sentence.Network_en: The final examination is viva - voce.

sentence.Network_cn: 我是从别人口中听说这事的.

sentence.Network_en: Some members of the huge crowd shouted "Viva peace, viva."
sentence.Network_cn: 浩浩荡荡的人群中有些人呼喊“和平万岁！万岁！”的口号。

list.abs: 口头盘问　oral cross-examination口头问题　viva voce question口头形式　orally
法律翻译常用拉丁词汇 | 法律英语翻译 ... versus 对，对抗 viva voce 口头 zygocephalum 土地测量.
日后如果学生参加八级以上的文凭考试，其中就有一项为口试（Viva Voce），只会用手指而不会用语言来表述音乐的学生是很难拿到 …

auth_sentence.content: I heard Churchill growl sotto voce but audibly enough.
auth_sentence.res_content: I heard Churchill growl sotto voce but audibly enough.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I heard Churchill growl sotto voce but audibly enough.

auth_sentence.content: I took my girlfriend in my Vauxhall Viva GT.
auth_sentence.res_content: I took my girlfriend in my Vauxhall Viva GT.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I took my girlfriend in my Vauxhall Viva GT.

auth_sentence.content: But this President wants to do it sotto voce.
auth_sentence.res_content: But this President wants to do it sotto voce.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But this President wants to do it sotto voce.
